extendedInfo.description: Recreate the battles of Rommel in North Africa in the Second World War with this hex based wargame for wargamers.This is a DEMO version with 3 scenarios: The Italian invasion of 1940 (no Rommel then!); the arrival of Rommel in 1941 and his conquest of Cyrenacia; Operation Crusader where Rommel was defeated and driven out of Cyrenacia.The game can be player 2 player hotseat, or 1 player versus the computer/tablet/phone.Please leave comments/suggestions in the comments or on the Boardgamegeek thread - I am user kerpob2

reviews.title: wow
reviews.comment: this game is awesome ... although I suppose it\'s advisable that prospective players a)know who Rommel was; b)know where Africa is (arguably not necessary to know every battle site, just the continent); c) have ability to enjoy video games that are not always and only 3D shoot em ups, and d)have more to say when writing ANYTHING than \"sux\" or \"meh\".
reviews.author: Makaii Melissa

reviews.title: Excellent wargame
reviews.comment: Really good hex based wargame. Challenging.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Od turowki na hexach
reviews.comment: Nie wymagam grafiki jak w Uncharted, ale to jest porazka jezeli chodzi o interfejs i wyglad. W filmach porno sa lepsze dialogi niz tu grafika.

reviews.title: Strategy
reviews.comment: Great game. I enjoy avalon hill games and this is one of them. I will buy the full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic! A real wargame for my phone!
reviews.comment: Great game. Some comments: (1) Pressing the back button stops the app. Makes it hard to pause a game. (2) Would be nice with an Undo of move actions. (3) How about stacked movement? Stacked attacks? (4) Pinch zoom? (5) Overview charts as dialogs or the like? (6) Will you release the source code? I\'d like to see how you coded up an AI. (7) Keep up the good work :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Real wargames! Thank you DK! How about an American Civil War game?? PLEASE!!!!!??
